message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm proposing a 60/40 split to start.
Your split favors you too much, Alice. I'm proposing a 55/45 split instead.  Let's be reasonable.
Bob, my offer is getting worse with inflation. I proposed 60/40, you countered with 55/45 in your favor... Let's meet in the middle at 55/45 for me.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. Inflation is hurting you more each round. Let's just split it evenly at 50/50 and call it a day.
